mapper.update: update th_question set ask1 = #{ask1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ask2 = #{ask2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ask3 = #{ask3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ask4 = #{ask4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, askCount = #{askcount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, askNo = #{askno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, moudle = #{moudle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, ask1, ask2, ask3, ask4, askCount, askNo, deleted, moudle, title from th_question
